content: TrustDice needs little introduction as they have proven themselves to be at the top of crypto casinos with thousands of reviews on Trustpilot coupled with industry leading bonuses, instant payouts and up to 20% cashback. To help spread the word here on Bitcointalk we are launching this Signature Campaign and if you are a quality gambling poster we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate to receive a payment.Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts in the gambling boards each week that you participate in order to receive a payment. These 10 will count towards the 20 post/weekly requirement.Do not have legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member of bitcointalk.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member you may be removed from the campaign without payment or notice.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, this thread, any campaign/bounty thread as well as on boards that your Signature is not displayed will not count towards the weekly requirement.A maximum of 10 posts/week from local boards will be counted for the weekly requirement.You need to have received a minimum of 5 merit in the last 120 days in order to join this Campaign.Do not wear any other Signature or Avatar during your stay in this campaign or you will be removed without payment or notice.Do not enroll your main and alt in this campaign or you will be removed and blacklisted from any and all of my campaigns and promotions.Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC Address each Monday.Each week will run from Mondays> Sundays with the cut-off being Sunday 23:59:59 according to my timezone (CET).This Campaign is open for Full Members,  Sr. Members, Hero Members and Legendary Members.TrustDice reserves the right to cancel and/or make changes to this Campaign at their discretion. Each started week will be paid out in full!Payouts and Positions:4x Full Members - $40 in BTC/Week.10x Sr. Members - $55 in BTC/Week.4x Hero/Legendary Members - $70 in BTC/Week.The Signatures:Full
